title: NEW HIGH NOON UNIVERSE LORE (Twisted Fate's last name and Urgot's first name revealed?)
body:
https://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/High_Noon 

I'm not sure what the sources are on this, but it seems that the High Noon universe just got some lore added to the skins with the announcement of the three new ones. However, in these lore bits, we have a couple of hints to some real names in the game. 

-Urgot, it seems, is his last name, with his full name being Jeremiah James Urgot. This may or may not apply to the canon universe, but it would definitely make sense, since Noxians seem to have both first and last names (ex. Jericho Swain, Katarina and Cassiopeia Du Couteau, and possibly Evaine LeBlanc).

-It seems that Twisted Fate's full real name is Tobias Felix. This would fit very well as his full canon name (we already know Tobias is his first from Burning Tides), especially since his High Noon skin is closest to his canon cowboy-esque theme. It's pretty much a given that most people from the most advanced regions like Bilgewater and Piltover have last names (ex. Malcolm Graves and Sarah Fortune), and Graves, one of the few who knows his real name, always calls him "TF", so it's assumed those are his actual initials that he prefers to be known by. "Felix" also means "lucky" in Latin, which, of course, fits right onto TF and his family and clan of professional magic-cheating gamblers. 

P.S. Does anyone know where High Noon Yasuo's lore is? Whoever posted the rest of this didn't seem to have access to it, or just didn't put it in at the time. I'd like to hear the in-universe reasons why Yasuo's bringing his sword to the gunfights.

replies.body: Yasuo's lore ran into a really awesome (it is not awesome and I hate it) giant office scorpion that we're currently attempting to kill. Hopefully will head to our localisation team tonight or early tomorrow.

If literal: Have the scorpion pose for a picture before you kill it.

If not Literal: Grab one of your art guys to mock up a picture. XD

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=smqcLfd6,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-15T00:02:07.683+0000)
>
> Yasuo's lore ran into a really awesome (it is not awesome and I hate it) giant office scorpion that we're currently attempting to kill. Hopefully will head to our localisation team tonight or early tomorrow.

Does the scorpion happen to be viable enough to pose a threat?

Regardless, that's awesome, can't wait to hear what his story is in this world.

P.S. Do you also know if you guys will ever be releasing the missing lores on some of the other skin universes? In particular, I'm thinking of Pulsefire Shen, Twisted Fate, and Riven, Dark Star Cho'Gath, Blood Moon Akali, and even Guqin Sona.

> [{quoted}](name=EdgeLady,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=smqcLfd6,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-08-15T01:18:08.145+0000)
>
> Does the scorpion happen to be viable enough to pose a threat?

Maybe if it began building bruiser or tank it would....

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=smqcLfd6,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-15T00:02:07.683+0000)
>
> Yasuo's lore ran into a really awesome (it is not awesome and I hate it) giant office scorpion that we're currently attempting to kill. Hopefully will head to our localisation team tonight or early tomorrow.

Pistol swords exist!
I love character full name reveals. Jeremiah James Urgot... what a boss.

wait... wasn't his name Tobias Fate? 

Tobias Felix sounds lame as hell. ew. like irl i get it but this is fiction why the hell would you give him a last name that sounds like a first name.

Shit if that's part of regular canon it legit made TF look like a dweeb.

yo fiddle tho:

> If the day ever comes, riding those dusty trails, when a thin man in a wide hat appears far in the distance... run. Ride hard and fast and never look back, lest the horror known as Fiddlesticks drag you to from your saddle, and into darkness.

that's like some gengar pokedex type shit, i like that one.

It was confirmed his first name is Tobias, but nothing about his last name was ever revealed. That's why people called him "Tobias Fate", because Fate was the second part of T.F. and players didn't have anything better to call him.

And also, if you think his name is lame, that's probably why he goes by the alias of Twisted Fate in the first place.

> [{quoted}](name=Helixarrow,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=smqcLfd6,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2018-08-15T13:38:27.576+0000)

> And also, if you think his name is lame, that's probably why he goes by the alias of Twisted Fate in the first place.

“Well, it’s a damn sight better than my real name." -{{champion:4}}, Burning Tides (Act 3 Part 4)

Yeah, it seems he feels the same way. I think his last name's better than his first though. Its meaning fits his character, instead of being the polar opposite of it. Plus he's got the First Name Last Name thing going. Classic, like old comic characters.
If im correct Tobias Fate full name is Tobias Foxtrot.

> [{quoted}](name=Palnatoke,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=smqcLfd6,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-08-15T01:12:31.564+0000)
>
> If im correct Tobias Fate full name is Tobias Foxtrot.

That was a joke on a thread speculating this very thing. No idea why some people think it's canon.
Ohh I saw this long time ago on http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Twisted_Fate

> -It seems that Twisted Fate&#039;s full real name is Tobias Felix.

_ehem_ __Tobias Fate__ _ehem_
Ya mean Emilia Leblanc? The ancient deciever within Noxus?
Skins are not canon, or Rumble is called Rumble Too Much
When High Noon Yasuo uses his first or second q, the sound effect is a pistol shot as apposed to a sword sound effect, so he may not be “bringing his sword to the gunfights.”
